import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Input, FormGroup, Label, Alert } from "reactstrap"; //Import Containers import SectionTitle from "../../components/Shared/section-title"; //Import Images import customer from "../../images/customer/customer.png"; class Ticket extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { ticketVisible : false } this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); this.setState({ticketVisible : true}) } render() { console.log(this.state.ticketVisible) return ( {/* section title */} { this.setState({ticketVisible : !this.state.ticketVisible}) }}> Ticket details send successfully.
); } } export default Ticket;
